mapper.sql: SELECT i18n_pref, i18n_ext_pk, i18n_lang, i18n_text FROM tbl_i18n_i18n
mapper.select:
SELECT i18n_text AS value , portico.concatenate( i18n_pref , ( CASE WHEN i18n_pref = 'cdrf' THEN ( SELECT portico.concatenate( '_' , portico.concatenate( portico.concatenate(cdrf_tpdt_pk, '_') , cdrf_valor ) ) FROM tbl_codigo_ref_cdrf WHERE cdrf_pk = i18n_ext_pk ) ELSE portico.concatenate('_', i18n_ext_pk) END ) ) AS label FROM tbl_i18n_i18n
ORDER BY i18n_pref, i18n_ext_pk, i18n_lang
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_i18n_i18n (i18n_pref, i18n_ext_pk, i18n_lang, i18n_text) VALUES (#{prefix}, #{externalId}, #{language}, #{text})
